name: Triton
description:
Triton is a simple 2D Shooter set in orbit of Neptune's moon Triton.

Brief Backstory;

In the year 2085, humanity reached the outer edges of the solar system. As the first astronauts landed on Triton, some reported they were hearing voices. As they explored, they discovered dark metal structures protruding from the ice. Proof of extraterrestrial intelligence. After spending 9 days on the icy moon, the astronauts went insane. Eventually they vanished and were never heard from again.

Now in 2090, you have been sent to Triton to investigate what happened to the astronauts. Unexpectedly, you've been intercepted by a fleet of Unidentified Spacecraft. Now your mission is to simply survive.

This is my first released game. Its nothing special, just a simple endless Shoot'em Up.

Enjoy!
